com.github.mathiewz.converter

Class EnumConverter<T extends Enum<T>>

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.github.mathiewz.converter.EnumConverter<T>
  • Type Parameters:
    T - The enum class to target

    public class EnumConverter<T extends Enum<T>>
extends Object
    This class provides method to convert data to an enum entry. All conversions are available through static and instance methods. Static methods have an extra parmeter to specify which enum is targeted.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      EnumConverter(Class<T> clazz)
      Create a new converter targeting the specified class.

    • Method Summary

    • Constructor Detail

      • EnumConverter

        public EnumConverter(Class<T> clazz)
        Create a new converter targeting the specified class.
        Parameters:
        clazz - the target class. must be an enum.

    • Method Detail

      • getByName

        public Optional<T> getByName(String name)
        Get enum entry corresponding to the specified name
        Parameters:
        name - the name of the entry (case sensitive)
        Returns:
        An optionnal with the entry if it exists, empty otherwise.

      • getByGetter

        public <E> Optional<T> getByGetter(java.util.function.Function<T,E> getterReference,
                                   E value)
        Get enum entry corresponding to the specified value.
        Type Parameters:
        E - the type of the value to convert
        Parameters:
        getterReference - the method reference returning the value to check.
        value - the value to convert.
        Returns:
        An optionnal with the entry if the result of the getterReference is equals to the value parameter.

      • getByName

        public static <F extends Enum<F>> Optional<F> getByName(Class<F> clazz,
                                                        String name)
        Get enum entry corresponding to the specified name
        Type Parameters:
        F - the type of the targeted enum.
        Parameters:
        clazz - the target class. must be an enum.
        name - the name of the entry (case sensitive)
        Returns:
        An optionnal with the entry if it exists, empty otherwise.

      • getByGetter

        public static <E,F extends Enum<F>> Optional<F> getByGetter(Class<F> clazz,
                                                            java.util.function.Function<F,E> getterReference,
                                                            E value)
        Get enum entry corresponding to the specified value.
        Type Parameters:
        E - the type of the value to convert
        F - the type of the targeted enum.
        Parameters:
        clazz - the target class. must be an enum.
        getterReference - the method reference returning the value to check.
        value - the value to convert.
        Returns:
        An optionnal with the entry if the result of the getterReference is equals to the value parameter.
